solution_line_template: For every addition of {additional_people_increment} people added the speed is halved so for the first {additional_people_increment} people added its speed is {speed_reduction_factor} * {initial_speed} km/hr = <<{initial_speed}*{speed_reduction_factor}={speed_after_first_addition}>>{speed_after_first_addition} km/hr.

For another addition of {additional_people_increment} people its speed is also halved, {speed_reduction_factor} * {speed_after_first_addition} km/hr = <<{speed_after_first_addition}*{speed_reduction_factor}={speed_after_second_addition}>>{speed_after_second_addition} km/hr. So for the total of {total_additional_people} additional people, its speed is {speed_after_second_addition} km/hr
